info.name: Hogwarts Schoolloop Login
info.description: Converts your old, boring Schoolloop login into an amazing Hogwarts login! It uses the Hogwarts crest to convert drab into fab!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.1
License: Public Domain
Known bugs: The login screen on the Schoolloop homepage may change to gray if homepage is also SchoolLoop hosted.
--
Made by Pranav Grover
